text: The Nelson Report is a daily communiqué of international events, though focused on Asia, aimed at the political audience in Washington, D.C. It is run and edited by Christopher Nelson. It was started in 1983. ==References== Kamen, Al (2005). "Special Report Goes on the Offensive," Washington Post, June 29, 2005. Category:Political magazines published in the United States Category:Magazines established in 1983
title: The Nelson Report
